content:
As I sit down to write this letter, my heart is heavy with the weight of the words I must convey. Amidst chaos and uncertainty, your presence in my life has been a beacon of light, guiding me through the darkest times.

I cannot express my emotions freely, but it feels different with you. Your unwavering determination and unyielding strength inspire me in ways I never thought possible. You challenge me to be a better version of myself, to confront the shadows of my past with courage and conviction.

There is a depth to your soul that captivates me, a warmth that melts away the barriers I've built around my heart. In your eyes, I see a reflection of my hopes and fears, and yet, I find solace in knowing that we are bound by something greater than ourselves.

There are shadows lurking in the corners of my life, threats that I cannot ignore. For your safety, for your well-being, I may have to make choices that lead us down separate paths. It pains me to even consider the possibility of parting ways, but I cannot in good conscience jeopardize your safety.

Though our time together may be fleeting, know that my feelings for you run deeper than words can express. In a world where truth is often obscured by lies and deceit, you are my guiding light, my anchor in the tempest. And for that, I am eternally grateful.

With all my love,
Luke
